name: People In Harry Potter Quiz | Harry Potter | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was the Death Eater who tortured Frank and Alice Longbottom into insanity?
questions.explanation:
Bellatrix Lestrange.

	Bellatrix Lestrange was introduced in "Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire". Bellatrix takes an obvious pleasure in acts of cruelty and of torture. This was shown when she tortured Frank and Alice Longbottom, as described in "Goblet of Fire". She also kills her cousin, Sirius Black, in "Order of the Phoenix".

questions.text: Garrick Ollivander had which life occupation?
questions.explanation:
Wandmaker.

	Garrick Ollivander was a wandmaker. He was also the owner of the Ollivanders shop. He was kidnapped by the Malfoys for several months in "Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince". Later he was rescued by Harry, Hermione and Ron.

Draco Malfoy.

	Pansy Parkinson was Draco Malfoy's girlfriend for a while in "Prisoner of Azkaban". She was also a school prefect. She was a member of the Inquisitorial Squad. Throughout the series, Pansy regularly mocks Harry and his companions.

questions.text: Which of these characters is a retired Auror?
questions.explanation:
Alastor (Mad-Eye) Moody.

	Alastor (Mad-Eye) Moody was a retired Auror. He was a member of the Order of the Phoenix. He was impersonated by Barty Crouch Jr. in "The Goblet of Fire". He was killed by Voldemort.

questions.text: Which one of these characters was one of Harry Potter's best friends?
questions.explanation:
Hermione Granger.

	One of Harry Potters best friends was Hermione Granger. She was the founder of Dumbledore's Army and the S.P.E.W. in "Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire". She becomes a Gryffindor Prefect in "Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix". This popular character was portrayed by Emma Watson in the movies. Hermione first appears in "Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone" when she meets Harry and Ron on the Hogwarts Express.

questions.text: Who was the caretaker of Hogwarts?
questions.explanation:
Argus Filch.

	Argus Filch is the caretaker of Hogwarts. He is grouchy and not pleasant, making him unpopular with the student body. He is not popular with the staff either. Filch has a cat named Mrs Norris with whom he has a possessive attachment.

questions.text: Madam Poppy Pomfrey is Dumbledore's mother.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Madam Poppy Pomfrey is the magical Healer of the Hogwarts hospital wing. She is tight-lipped and very strict when it comes to her patients. She takes good care of Harry quite often. She is often seen tending to injured fighters.

questions.text: Who is the red-headed best friend of Harry Potter?
questions.explanation:
Ron Weasley.

	Ron Weasley first appears in the first book of the series, "Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone". He is a member of the Gryffindor house with Harry. Ron is a mediocre student and an average Quidditch player.  Ron comes from a poor family and many of his belongings are second-hand. Ron is present in most of the movie series.

Ghost.

	Cuthbert Binns is the only teacher at Hogwarts who is a ghost. He is "The History of Magic" teacher during the entire series. He is supposed to be very boring. He also gets the students' names wrong constantly.

questions.text: Alecto and Amycus Carrow are lovers who are the head of the Death Eaters.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Alecto and Amycus Carrow are a brother and sister who tortured many of the students at Hogwarts. Both are squat, ugly, and have a terrible laugh. They were defeated before the Battle of Hogwarts in "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows" by Harry Potter and Minerva McGonagall.
